asteroids

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.Vector
      • asteroids.Position

  • public class Position
extends asteroids.Vector
    A class implementing simple positional information in two dimensions for objects in the game.
    Version:
    0.0
    Author:
    Syd & Xavier

        Moves this position using a given velocity during a given duration.
        Parameters:

        duration - The given duration.
        Throws:
